Today I’m going home to HEAVEN to live for all eternity with my HEAVENLY FATHER JESUS CHRIST, and as I lay here taking my last breath, I’ll be praying for all of you because you’re here today with anger and hatred in your hearts letting Satan deceive you into believing that what you’re doing is right and just. Dyson for praying for me and everyone that has been praying for me. Christ Jesus name I pray this. Though my judgment is merciful, I hope and pray that all those involved as well as the judgment upon ya’ll, will one day be more merciful than mine. Continue to pray for me, I am fine. I pray you will have no ill will or animosity. And I pray and ask God’s forgiveness for all of us respectively as human beings. I pray to God, the Lord Almighty that like he did for me, he will reach out and help you. In Jesus name I pray, Amen. I pray that the good Lord will give you all peace.
